example.en: In addition, various members of the general contracting firm were in attendance.

example.en: Through it all, however, their testimonies remained steadfast and firm.

example.en: I just love a man with a firm bicep.

example.en: Those were the firm, urgent words of Mother as she gave me a hug.

example.en: She is standing firm, doing a very hard thing but one she knows to be right.

example.en: But when it is serious, be firm.
example.vi: Nhưng nếu nghiêm trọng, cần phải cương nghị.

example.en: He was raised by a loving yet firm father, who loyally cared for his mother.

example.en: Or you might comment about unemployment if a large firm has laid off many workers.

example.en: Adjusting your secular employment may require that you take a firm stand.

example.en: Parents need firmness, patience, and discipline to prevent these attitudes from becoming entrenched.
